tags.name: button
tags.description: A button means an operation (or a series of operations). Clicking a button will trigger corresponding business logic.

attributes.name: nz-button
attributes.description: nz-button directive is required for antd to work

attributes.name: nzType
attributes.description: In Ant Design, 4 types of button are provided. primary, default, dashed, text

values.name: primary
values.description: indicate the main action, one primary button at most in one section.

values.name: default
values.description: indicate a series of actions without priority.

values.name: text
values.description: used for the most secondary action.
